sense.def:
A judgement
je mnenje, ki ga imamo ali izrazimo, potem ko pazljivo razmislimo o nečem.

seg.quote: I shall make my own judgement on this matter when I see the results.
In our judgment, her plan has definitely succeeded.

sense.def:
A judgement
je tudi odločitev, ki jo sprejme sodnik ali sodišče.

seg.quote: The final judgment will probably be made in court.

sense.def:
A judgement
je tudi nekaj neprijetnega, kar se nam zgodi in velja za božjo kazen.

seg.quote: War is a judgement on us all for our sins.

sense.def:
Judgement
je tudi sposobnost razumno ugibati o nekem položaju ali se pametno odločiti, kaj je treba storiti.

seg.quote: My father did not permit me to question his judgement.

sense.def:
Judgement
je tudi postopek odločanja o tem, kako dober je nekdo ali nekaj.

seg.quote: I have a great fear of judgment.
During her career a scientist must survive many judgments.

sense.def:
To pass judgement on something
pomeni dati svoje mnenje o nečem, zlasti kadar kritiziramo ali ocenjujemo.

To reserve judgement about something
pomeni ne dati svojega mnenja o nečem, dokler ne izvemo kaj več o tistem.

Kadar je nekaj
against one's better judgement
, verjamemo, da bi bilo pametneje, če nečesa ne bi storili.
